item.title: 1. Project Initialization
item.description: In fact, I had been working on a similar project for some time. Although I tried to complete it, I eventually gave up because it was too complex and inefficient to move forward with. So I decided to restart the project from scratch. 1. Project Tech Stack Area Tech Backend Python(FastAPI), Redis, Redis Queue(RQ), PostgreSQL Frontend React + Vite Infra Docker, Docker Compose, .env, .yml 2. Backend Settings 2.1 backend.DockerFile This DockerFile installs backend system dependencies and Python packaging tool(uv) for the Python 3.12.11 environment.
